name: Crystal Cave (itch) (happypappysara)
description:
TO PLAY: Download and extract the ZIP file, open the file named Crystal Cave! Only available on Windows/PC currently.

Hey! I'm a student at the University of Florida achieving my bachelors in digital arts & sciences. One of my classes this semester featured creating a video game from scratch. It took many months, all-nighters, and tears of frustration. I am finally done and happy with the project!

In this game, you play as the wizard named Atticus. Your goal is to collect all 5 crystals and find the secret entrance to Crystal Cave! Avoid mushrooms though, they deal damage and you only have three lives.

WASD or arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump, esc or quit buttons to quit.

Special thanks to my professor, lecturer, and wonderful classmates.
